caseTitle: President, Balochistan High Court Bar Association v. Federation of Pakistan and others
tagline: The Attorney General for Pakistan and the Advocate General of Balochistan are directed to provide assistance in the matter of the statement involving Frontier Corps personnel in the kidnapping and murder of two persons in the area of Mastung made on the floor of the House of Provincial Assembly. Directions about recovery of missing persons, improvement of law and order situation in Balochistan and investigation of murder of wife and daughter of Mir Bakhtiar Domki are also given.
